Title: Dui Duari
Writer: Humayun Ahmed (novel), Humayun Ahmed (dialogue), Humayun Ahmed (screenplay)
Actors: Riaz, Meher Afroz Shaon, Mahfuz Ahmed, Masud Ali Khan
Plot: The story is centered around a middle class family and their middle class daily life issues, with one exception of inclusion of a mysterious man (Raiz) who does not know where he has come ...
